shortDesc.message: Control volume of current tab from 0% to 500%.

storeDesc.message:
This extension allows you to control the volume of the active tab from 0% to 500%, as well as see a list of tabs that are currently playing audio.


**Notes**

— A page reload may be required after installing the extension.
— May not work with several methods of media delivery on pages (e.g., music on VKontakte or Spotify).

volumeWarning.message: Warning: High volume can damage hearing.
